**Government Tender Announcement**
==========================

### Ergonomic and Health and Safety Assessment Services

**Tender Reference Number:** PW-23-01025429
**Tender Title:** Ergonomic and Health and Safety Assessment Services
**Closing Date:** March 23, 2023, 15:00:00 Eastern Time

The House of Commons is seeking proposals from qualified service providers to deliver ergonomic and health and safety assessment services.

**Background:**

The Parliamentary Protective Service (PPS) has implemented the Policy on Health, Safety, and Wellness in the workplace, which emphasizes the importance of addressing workplace risks and hazards. The health and safety branch at PPS has been working to address these risks and is seeking assistance from qualified service providers to:

* Assist employees in returning to work after illness or injury
* Identify and remove risk factors associated with the work environment to prevent musculoskeletal disorders
* Quantify physical and cognitive demands of job tasks, identify high-risk tasks, and provide recommendations to eliminate or reduce risks

**Tender Requirements:**

* Service providers must have experience in delivering ergonomic and health and safety assessment services
* Proposals must demonstrate a thorough understanding of the Policy on Health, Safety, and Wellness and its application to the work environment
* Service providers must be able to identify and assess workplace risks and hazards and provide recommendations for mitigation

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The evaluation process will be based on the following criteria:

* Relevant experience and qualifications of the service provider
* Quality of the proposal and demonstration of understanding of the Policy on Health, Safety, and Wellness
* Ability to identify and assess workplace risks and hazards

**Important Dates:**

* Tender closing date: March 23, 2023, 15:00:00 Eastern Time
* Tender evaluation: March 23, 2023, to April 7, 2023

**Contact Information:**

For further information or to submit a proposal, please contact:

Michael Shellard
Parliamentary Protective Service
hse.pp-ps@parl.gc.ca
343-552-7532
